StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProgramBooks]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(
@Title varchar(50) = null, @Descrip.on varchar(50) = null, @Keywords varchar(50) = null ) AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT PG.ID, PG.Name, PG.Organiza.onId, P.Title, P.Descrip.on, P.Keywords, P.FileName FROM USMC.ProgramDocument P JOIN USMC.ProgramDocumentGroup PG ON (PG.ID = P.ProgramDocumentGroupID) WHERE (@Title is null OR Title like @Title) AND (@Descrip.on is null OR Descrip.on like @Descrip.on) AND (@Keywords is null OR Keywords like @Keywords)
Order By PG.DisplayOrder
END
